name: JUUL JUNKER
description: The Earth is constantly being littered with e - cigarette products, that are harmful to the environment. It is your job to save the environment by recycling JUUL pods littered throughout the planet. The goal of the game is to reach the top platform, while collecting every JUUL pod to advance to the next level. You have limited attempts, so use them wisely. Make sure you collect every JUUL, or you won't be able to advance to the next level.
